title: Biden's European adventure: Anne Gearan & Courtney Kube
description: President Biden ends his first overseas trip meeting Russian President Putin at a summit in Geneva. The Putin summit is the capstone to a complex series of meetings that the president attended during this overseas trip — including meetings with the G-7, NATO and the EU.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: President Biden ends his first overseas trip meeting Russian President Putin at a summit in Geneva. The Putin summit is the capstone to a complex series of meetings that the president attended during this overseas trip — including meetings with the G-7, NATO and the EU.
itunes:title: Biden's European adventure: Anne Gearan & Courtney Kube
itunes:author: NBC News
itunes:summary: Anne Gearan, White House correspondent from the Washington Post and NBC News correspondent, Courtney Kube join Chuck to discuss.
